first.heading: Construction of (non-) residential premises
first.text: IE "Baky Bereket" performs a full cycle of works on the construction of residential premises, as well as industrial, civil and agricultural facilities.

second.heading: Reconstruction
second.text: Our company has extensive experience in superstructure, rebuilding, expansion of capital construction projects, and we also specialize in the replacement and restoration of load-bearing building structures.

third.heading: Development
third.text: Our team has the resources and experience to implement all stages of building design without involving subcontractors. Trusting us, you save time and get a guarantee of an impeccable result and meeting deadlines.

projects.heading: Completed Projecs
projects.text: Our company has a wide experience in the construction of facilities and structures, being among the leaders of the construction market of Turkmenistan, we guarantee quality, reliability and modernity.

1st.title: Commercial complex "Rysgal"
1st.text: Construction of a commercial complex "Rysgal", which includes JSCB "Rysgal", 2 shopping centers and an 8-storey residential building, with a capacity of 84 apartments.

location.heading: Location:
location.text: Ankara str. and Oguzhan str. intersection, Ashgabat, Turkmenistan.

client.heading: Client:
client.text: Union Of Industrialists And Entrepreneurs Of Turkmenistan.

dates.heading: The start and completion of construction works:

2nd.title: Kindergarten № 9
2nd.text: Demolition of Kindergarten № 3 and construction of Kindergarten № 9 at its place with a capacity of 450 children.

client.heading: Client:
client.text: Department of Education of Kaka district, Department of Education of Akhal velayat.

dates.heading: The start and completion of construction works:

3rd.title: Construction and installation works
3rd.text: Construction and installation works for ES "Ak Depe Hyzmat" in the residential complex "Gypjak", Ruhabat district, Ashgabat, as well as the installation of technological equipment for "Milk and Fermented Milk Products" plant.

dates.heading: The start and completion of construction works:

4th.title: Construction of a Greenhouse
4th.text: Construction of a greenhouse on a land plot belonging to M. Sopyev Agricultural Joint-Stock Company of Ak Bugdai district, Akhal velayat with an area of 4 hectares for growing vegetables.

location.heading: Location:
location.text: M. Sopyev Agricultural Joint-Stock Company of Ak Bugdai district, Akhal velayat, Turkmenistan.

client.heading: Client:
client.text: Construction was carried out for the own needs of our company.

dates.heading: The start and completion of construction works:

5th.title: Construction of a Greenhouse
5th.text: Individual Enterprise "Baky Bereket" is considered by the Baharden District Working Group, Akhal Velayat for the construction of modern greenhouses for growing vegetables on 9 hectares plot.

location.heading: Location:
location.text: Farmers Association of Archman, Baharden district, Akhal velayat, Turkmenistan.

client.heading: Client:
client.text: Baharden District Working Group, Akhal Velayat, Turkmenistan.

dates.heading: The start and completion of construction works:

about.text: Individual enterprise "Baky Bereket" was founded in 2014 and is one of the leading companies in Turkmenistan, specializing in the construction of housing complexes, commercial real estate, non-residential premises, as well as design and development of buildings.

form.heading: Contact Us
form.text: Send us your request by filling out and the form below.
